title: Vocational Education Program for Strengthening Social Safety Assurance and Teacher Training Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of vocational education systems and possession of basic teaching competencies
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based LMS learning environment provided for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners perform a SWOT analysis on three social safety threat cases (natural disasters, cybersecurity incidents, facility defects) provided via PBL, propose at least two actionable response strategies per case, and achieve an 80% or higher fulfillment rate through team presentation evaluations.
Learners can design at least three strategies to enhance learners' emotional stability using activity-centered teaching methods
Learners can apply teachers' core competencies for social safety assurance (e.g., stress tolerance, communication skills) in actual educational settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
